welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Andresy, a charming city known for its beautiful riverside views and picturesque streets. We invite you to immerse yourself in its unique culture and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay in this lovely destination!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Dedicated for private and business flights

wifi.note: Free wifi available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A-2G) and serving a mix of international and domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium high-speed WiFi is also available for purchase.
